meanings.sent1: The knight fastened the taslet securely around his thighs.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to wear a taslet to protect your thighs in battle.
meanings.sent3: The tiny squirrel fashioned a taslet out of acorn shells for protection.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was her taslet, shielding her true feelings from others.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering taslet gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of strength and defense.
